ModMetaData.name: PlaceWorker Restrictions
ModMetaData.author: RimWorld CCL Team
ModMetaData.description:
This is an example of how to use certain PlaceWorkers.
Demonstrates: PlaceWorker_RestrictedCount PlaceWorker_NotOnTerrain PlaceWorker_OnlyOnTerrain PlaceWorker_NotOnThing PlaceWorker_OnlyOnThing RestrictedPlacement_Comp RestrictedPlacement_Properties TerrainWithComps
